channel.title: Abouts on Kunhao Zheng
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Kunhao Zheng

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a 4th-year student in École Polytechnique in France, enrolled in the “Cycle Ingénieur” Program. I am also a 2nd-year Master student in Shanghai Jiao Tong University as part of my double-degree program supervised by Ya Zhang. Before École Polytechnique, I obtained my Bachelor degree in a Sino-French prépa institute in Shanghai Jiao Tong University, where I received intense training of mathematics and physics in French for the entrance to the Grand École.
